name: Chipotle Honey-Butter Potato Chips
description: An undeniable excess, these salted potato chips are coated in honey butter with a smoky kick of chipotle chili powder.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large skillet with sloped sides, melt butter with honey over medium heat, stirring to combine. Stir in chipotle chili powder to taste (I use about 6 small pinches). Add potato chips and stir gently until well coated, lowering heat to prevent scorching if necessary. Transfer to a bowl and serve warm.
